p: This is a retrospective review of patients with a cycling-related injury presenting to Saint Vincent¡¯s University Hospital (SVUH) from 1st of January to 31st of December 2014. Subjects were identified by interrogating the Maxims Clinical© patient information system in use at the ED. Triage records were searched for the keywords; “bike”, “cycling”, “cyclist”, “pushbike”, “bicycle”. SVUH participates in the Trauma Audit and Research Network (TARN) and data was extracted from this database, e.g. the injury severity score (ISS) for patients who fulfilled the criteria for TARN.
